evidence.claim: Archangel utilizes AWS for cloud services and data storage.
The company supports HIPAA-compliant data handling.
Integration with EHR systems through FHIR technology is part of Archangel's architecture.
Archangel implements EDI standards including X12 for healthcare transactions.
They use GCP services for machine learning workflows.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of dealing with X12 transactions or healthcare data exchange.
